column2: ENGLISH
A great warrior, Hrolfr, has distinguished himself in many battles and raids. I believe this man could be a valuable Commander and a competent military leader.
His potential bears watching.
My tribe wishes to resettle and the lands of the south are fertile yet divided. If I resettle my tribe along the water the west, I can allow them to prosper.
Mortain is best!.
Rouen seems natural.
Évreux is rich and weak.

I have fought long and hard for my liege and I have attracted a large, yet loyal, following. Rather than rise up against my old liege, I've decided to strike out for [From.Duchy.GetFullBaseName]. Let [From.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] tremble in fear!
Prepare the boats!
One of the most capable warriors in the realm, Hrolfr, has gathered a large following of men and has set out declaring his intention to establish lands of his own somewhere in the west.
May he bring glory to his tribe!
The Normans

On the shores of northern France, a great Nordic warrior, Hrolfr, also known as Gaange Rolf due to being too heavy to ride a horse, has invaded the northern shores of France and seized land for himself and his Nordic tribesmen. Nordic activity along these shores is not unheard of but Hrolfr's settlement has melded together the Norsemen and local French cultures together resulting in a new designation, the Normans.
I only wanted to settle down with my tribe.
He is an inspiration to all Norseman!
These Norsemen get everywhere.

Local Bishops, concerned about paganism in France, have approached me with their obvious desire for me to convert to Christianity. Whilst their insecurities about Norsemen are laughable, there may be some merit to their desire. I have had glimpses of their religion, and it may not be as undesirable as I once thought.
I will, henceforth, become a Christian.
I will remain true to Odin!
My tribe is unhappy with our current environment. I must consider resettling them.
But where can I take them?

The records of my dynasty indicate we have a potential claim on the Kingdom of England.  I can gather the best troops in the realm and march on England with an army to take my rightful place as King!.
England is rightfully mine!
We do not need England.
